title: "wood ashe skin has been unlocked" in champ select
body: dont know what this is, but this is the 2nd time this has happened. it was a draft normals, and before i picked ashe, i got "woad ashe skin has been unlocked for you this game" does anyone know what this is? also no skin was unlocked

replies.body: Someone was most likely using the /me command to do a sort of emote. It's a little feature that was left in the game, and I don't believe many know it even exists. Anytime you see that orange text but it doesn't seem official, it's most likely someone using /me.
